Pre-Game Insights: The Kiwis will still start the game as firm favourites, but recent form could play a role in making this a tighter contest than the World Cup table suggests.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan and New Zealand have faced off on 115 occasions in ODIs, with Pakistan winning 60 of those matches.
Others: The match will begin at 10:30am IST.
The match will be played at the M Chinnaswamy Stadium in Bengaluru on Saturday, 4 November.
